auction

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • auction.Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Item class. It holds all the information on a given item for an auction. The item is able to add and remove bids from myBids, and it can "unseal" a bid with a username and password.
    Version:
    February 23, 2014
    Author:
    Kevin Alexander

      • addBid

        public boolean addBid(Bid the_bid)
        This method takes in a Bid item and adds it to the current list of Bid objects. Precondition: None Postcondition: The Bid item has been added to the list of Bid objects.
        Parameters:
        the_bid - The Bid object that is being added to the myBids list.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the Bid object was successfully added to the list or not.

      • removeBid

        public boolean removeBid(Bid the_bid)
        This method takes in a Bid item and adds it to the current list of Bid objects. Precondition: The list myBids has at least one Bid. Postcondition: The Bid item has been removed from the list of Bid objects.
        Parameters:
        the_bid - The Bid object that is being removed from the myBids list.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the Bid object was successfully deleted from the list or not.

      • unsealBid

        public Bid unsealBid(java.lang.String the_username,
            java.lang.String the_password)
        This method takes in two Strings, which represent the username and password of one member of the AuctionCentral Staff, and verifies that they are correct. It then returns the highest bid or returns null. Precondition: The item must have at least one bid in myBids and the file admin.txt must be existent and contain the proper username and password. Postcondition: If the correct username and password were entered, the highest bid is returned.
        Parameters:
        the_username - The username that is being entered.
        the_password - The password that is being entered.
        Returns:
        Returns the highest bid.

      • getScanner

        private java.util.Scanner getScanner(java.lang.String the_file_name)
        This is a private method that is used in the unsealBid() method. It takes in a String containing the file location and attempts to assign a Scanner object to it. The Scanner object is then returned. Precondition: The String should contain a valid file path for the username and password. Postcondtion: The Scanner object should be assigned to the File at the String's location. If it doesn't then the Scanner is null.
        Parameters:
        the_file_name - A String object containing the file path of the username and password.
        Returns:
        A Scanner object if the file was found and null otherwise.
